analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā upanando sakyaputto sañcetanikaṁ sukkavissaṭṭhiṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitvā bhātuno saddhivihārikassa bhikkhuno ārocesi—
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasmā upanandaḥ sakya putto sañcetanikam sukka vissaṭṭhim āpattim āpajjitvā bhātunaḥ saddhivihārikassa bhikkhunaḥ ārocesi

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu sañcetanikaṁ sukkavissaṭṭhiṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitvā saṅghaṁ tassā āpattiyā parivāsaṁ yāci.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññataraḥ bhikkhu sañcetanikam sukka vissaṭṭhim āpattim āpajjitvā saṅgham tassā āpattiyā parivāsam yāci

original: Tassa saṅgho tassā āpattiyā parivāsaṁ adāsi.

original: So parivasanto taṁ bhikkhuṁ passitvā etadavoca—

original: “ahaṁ, āvuso, sañcetanikaṁ sukkavissaṭṭhiṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitvā saṅghaṁ tassā āpattiyā

original: parivāsaṁ yāciṁ, tassa me saṅgho tassā āpattiyā parivāsaṁ adāsi, sohaṁ parivasāmi,
analyzed: parivāsam yāci tassa me saṅghaḥ tassā āpattiyā parivāsam adāsi saḥ ham parivasāmi

original: vediyāmahaṁ, āvuso, vediyatīti maṁ āyasmā dhāretū”ti.

original: “Kiṁ nu kho, āvuso, yo aññopi imaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjati sopi evaṁ karotī”ti?

original: “Ayaṁ, āvuso, āyasmā upanando sakyaputto sañcetanikaṁ sukkavissaṭṭhiṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitvā so me āroceti mā kassaci ārocehī”ti.
analyzed: āvuso āyasman upanandaḥ sakya putto sañcetanikam sukka vissaṭṭhim āpattim āpajjitvā saḥ me āroceti mā kassaci ārocehi iti
